Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 102nd overall pick, by New York in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off William Lisk (BRO)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/2015, off Tobias Ortiz (BRO)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Boston on 4/28/2015...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/2018, hitting .571 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2019, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/2019, hitting .462 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Injured on 10/20/2019 with a Concussion, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/16/2020 to a 5-year deal worth $13,400,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/2020, hitting .471 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 4/30/2020 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Colorado on 6/27/2020...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2021, hitting .565 with 6 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2021, hitting .301 with 10 HR, 22 RBI...
Injured on 7/17/2022 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2023, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
